WorkItem.Description:
Currently the disable by item level has a 
188-213 = blues & up to Naxx epics & T7
214-245 = Tier 8 10s, T8 25s, T9 10s & T9 25s
246-258 = T9 25 heroics
258+ = Icecrown
 
I'd like to suggest that 214-245 covering two whole tiers is too wide a filter. Could it be replaced by
 
214-231 = T8 10s & T8 25s
232-245 = T9 10s & T9 25s
 
So that users can filter T8 gear separately from T9 gear.
WorkItem.Summary: [ItemFilters] Request for finer grained disable item level

Comments.Message: The second filter still includes Uld hard mode gear, which is 239.
And check out the other filters - T8 and T9 are easily separable.
*duh*  It's Levva, of course you knew that.  Additionally, the second filter also includes T8 normal weapons.
